body: it would be funny if the husband and the daughter found out  and decide to fuck each other

How the hell is this not manipulation?! The guy just used his grief and even his abuse of his own daughter to coerce that dumb b*tch into having sex with him. Of course, she went along with it, because that's what you do when you find out a father is sexually abusing his daughter: you don't report him to the police, you have sex with him. What?! Lol! And surprise, surprise! End of the story, she's fully in love with his d*ck.
